snippet: Looking at Mother's Day, the doubling of Stafford Loan rates may add just $6 a month, a panel backs preventive use of an H.I.V. drug and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
abstract: Looking at Mother's Day, the doubling of Stafford Loan rates may add just $6 a month, a panel backs preventive use of an H.I.V. drug and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.

headline.main: Friday Reading: Mother's Day: Yours or Your Mom's?
